QuestData.Title: Only the Worthy Shall Pass
QuestData.Description: It is time for you to face me. With these three fires illuminating your potential, we will see with certainty whether your resolved soul is truly worthy of passing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Master Li Fei in combat.
QuestData.RewardText: Remember always, the superior warrior is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
